item.title: Maine Ghost Hunters - Urban Exploration
item.description: Maine Ghost Hunters, Kat and Tony, spend the day exploring an abandoned location. We made this trip at the very end of a snowstorm so it was easy to tell if anyone had been in/out of the building besides us. The snow was undisturbed at all entrance/exit locations except for some animal prints under a window at the backside of the building as noted by TonyL at the start of the video. We didn't do any ghost hunting on this day, but we did holler out some questions asking if anyone was with us when we heard footsteps and thuds in the walls and on the floors.
item.itunes:subtitle: Maine Ghost Hunters investigates an abandoned location for the first time

We didn't do any ghost hunting on this day, but we did holler out some questions asking if anyone was with us when we heard footsteps and thuds in the walls and on the floors.
